conversations.body_text: Hi Thiago Sanches,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, but we expect to restock today. We will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees you paid.

Good afternoon,
I still haven't received any response from support and I can't access the customer support area through the link they sent in that email.

 

    Em terça-feira, 16 de dezembro de 2025 às 14:28:27 GMT, service@simsonn.com

Hi Thiago Sanches,    We apologize for the delayed response. Your order was scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to shipping delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They arrived yesterday, and we have now shipped your order and updated your shipping notification.
